channel.title: 24/7 Hoster needed
channel.description:
I'll be needing a hoster for my server Chemicalscape, being released soon. I will need to know and trust you, so if not, dont bother posting. [b]Requirements:[/b] Fast internet + Computer. 43594 Port available. 24/7 hosting Be online regularly for updates to take place.
[b]Rewards:[/b] I Will discuss that with you privatly.
Thanks. ChemicalReaction™
